articles.title: Trump signs executive orders targeting universities and education equity efforts
articles.description: Universities’ financial ties with foreign sources have long been a concern among Republicans, especially ties with China.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump has ordered sharper scrutiny of America’s universities and the accreditors that oversee them.
It forms part of his escalating campaign to end what he calls “wokeness” and diversity efforts in education.
